meanings.definition: Energids: living units within a plant cell that contain chloroplasts
meanings.sent1: The energids in the plant cell help with photosynthesis.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study energids to understand how plants make food.
meanings.sent3: The energids in the plant cell were having a party with the chloroplasts.
meanings.sent4: The energids danced inside the plant cell like tiny green fairies.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the energids looked like bustling little factories producing energy.

meanings.definition: Energids: small particles of energy that are believed to be the building blocks of matter
meanings.sent1: Some scientists think energids are the key to unlocking the secrets of the universe.
meanings.sent2: The concept of energids as building blocks is fascinating to physicists.
meanings.sent3: The energids were playing hide and seek with the atoms in the lab.
meanings.sent4: In the world of physics, energids are the tiny sparks that ignite creation.
meanings.sent5: Imagining energids as the Lego pieces of the cosmos makes the universe seem more playful.
